name: go to toilet (game made as a joke when I was in vc with friends)
name_original: go to toilet (game made as a joke when I was in vc with friends)
description:
go to toilet (game made as a joke when I was in vc with friends) is a simulation game developed by Bedwarsix. It came out on 22-02-2022.
You can play go to toilet (game made as a joke when I was in vc with friends) on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
